column1: #Text=[0032] The different sensors 5 to 9 are connected to a calculator 10, in which there are recorded tables or maps characteristic of the engine.
#Text=These tables are preestablished by preliminary measurements performed for each engine.
#Text=[0033] The method for determination of the mass m.sub.c(t) of particles present in the filter at the instant t now is described.
#Text=[0034] This method consists in repeating, at determined time intervals .DELTA.t, the sequence of operations described below:
#Text=[0035] (i) In a first operation, there is measured, at the instant t, the temperature T(t) of the exhaust gases at the inlet of the particle filter, by using temperature sensor 5.
#Text=The value obtained is recorded in calculator 10.
#Text=[0036] (ii) In substantially simultaneous manner, there are measured, at the instant t, the operating parameters Ne and Q of the engine, by means of sensors 6 and 7.
#Text=The measured values are also recorded in calculator 10.
